roles.name: The Dealer
roles.description:
OBJECTIVE: Work together to kill as many Party Animals as possible without getting caught.

SPECIAL ABILITIES:
 The Murder: Choose a victim to murder each night with the other Dealers.

STRATEGY:
Remain hidden. Coordinate with other Dealers and The Whore to eliminate the Party Animals. They do not die if The Whore dies.

roles.name: The Party Animal
roles.description:
OBJECTIVE: To survive for as many nights as possible and find The Dealers.

SPECIAL ABILITIES:
 None.

STRATEGY:
Observe player behavior, discuss with others, and vote wisely during the day to identify and eliminate The Dealers before they kill everyone.

roles.name: The Medic
roles.description:
OBJECTIVE: To help The Party Animals survive.

SPECIAL ABILITIES:
 Choose ONE on Night 1:
  1. REVIVE: Resurrect one dead Party Animal (including themselves) at any point in the game.
  2. PROTECT: Choose one person to protect from murder at the start of every round.
*Note:* Once the choice is made on Night 1, it cannot be changed.

STRATEGY:
Use their chosen ability wisely to keep innocent players alive and reduce The Dealer's advantage.

roles.name: The Bouncer
roles.description:
OBJECTIVE: Use ID checking power to uncover The Dealers.

SPECIAL ABILITIES:
 Check I.D.: Each night, select a player to ask the Host about. The Host will nod (if Dealer) or shake head (if Party Animal).
 Roofi Powers: Can take the paralyzing powers from The Roofi if they suspect they are abusing them. *Warning:* If they incorrectly suspect The Roofi, they lose their ability to check I.D.s forever.

STRATEGY:
Remain hidden. Only expose themselves when they have enough support. Be cautious when challenging The Roofi.

roles.name: The Messy Bitch
roles.description:
OBJECTIVE: Spread rumours to everyone.

SPECIAL ABILITIES:
• The Rumour Mill: Each night, wakes up and chooses a player to start a rumour about.

WIN CONDITION:
Wins immediately if every currently living player (besides herself) has heard a rumour.

roles.name: The Wallflower
roles.description:
OBJECTIVE: To see the murders and provide hints without being discovered by The Dealers.

SPECIAL ABILITIES:
 See the Murders: Can discreetly open eyes during the night phase to watch the murder happen (optional choice).

STRATEGY:
Be discreet. Formulate hints during the day that guide The Party Animals toward The Dealers without explicitly revealing their role, or they will be killed next.

roles.name: The Whore
roles.description:
OBJECTIVE: Defend The Dealers as much as possible, even putting themselves in the firing line.

SPECIAL ABILITIES:
 Deflection: Can choose to deflect a vote from a Dealer (or themselves) to another player.

STRATEGY:
Actively defend The Dealers during discussions. Redirect suspicion. They win if The Dealers win.

roles.name: The Clinger
roles.description:
OBJECTIVE: Survive by supporting their partner's vote unconditionally.

SPECIAL ABILITIES:
 Obsession: Must support their partner's vote unconditionally. If their partner dies, they die.
 Attack Dog: If their obsession calls them a 'controller', they are freed from the obsession and gain the ability to kill one player immediately.

STRATEGY:
Influence their partner subtly. Always follow their partner's vote to avoid suspicion. If their obsession calls them a 'controller', they become an attack dog and can strike back.

roles.name: The Roofi
roles.description:
OBJECTIVE: Help The Party Animals by neutralizing other players.

SPECIAL ABILITIES:
 Paralyze: Each night, select a player. They cannot speak or move for that round. If a Dealer is Roofi'd, they are also paralyzed the following night.

STRATEGY:
Silence key opponents (like The Messy Bitch or an outspoken Dealer). Be careful not to abuse power, or The Bouncer might strip your ability.

roles.name: The Lightweight
roles.description:
OBJECTIVE: To survive and avoid dying by saying a 'taboo' name.

SPECIAL ABILITIES:
 Memory Loss: After every night, the Host points to a player. That name becomes 'taboo'. If they speak that name, they die immediately.

STRATEGY:
Remember which names are taboo. Use their 'drunkenness' to confuse Dealers without being discovered. Always deny being The Lightweight.

roles.name: The Tea Spiller
roles.description:
OBJECTIVE: To expose a Dealer's role upon death.

SPECIAL ABILITIES:
 Death Reveal: When The Tea Spiller dies, they get to expose 1 player's role as either a Dealer or Not.

STRATEGY:
Use the threat of their final reveal to influence votes. If they strongly suspect a Dealer, they may sacrifice themselves to guarantee the reveal.

roles.name: The Minor
roles.description:
OBJECTIVE: To survive until The Dealers are eliminated.

SPECIAL ABILITIES:
 Death Protection: Cannot die unless The Bouncer has checked her identity (I.D.'d her). If Dealers try to kill her before she is I.D.'d, the attempt fails.

STRATEGY:
Remain low-profile and avoid drawing The Bouncer's attention. Once she is I.D.'d, she is vulnerable.

roles.name: The Sober
roles.description:
OBJECTIVE: Protect Party Animals and prevent night murders.

SPECIAL ABILITIES:
 Drive Home: Once per game, choose one player to 'send home' at the start of the night. That player is safe from death. If you send a Dealer home, there are NO murders that night.

STRATEGY:
Use your single power wisely to save a key player or block a suspected Dealer from killing.

roles.name: The Seasoned Drinker
roles.description:
OBJECTIVE: Soak up Dealer murder attempts.

SPECIAL ABILITIES:
 Immunity: Has extra lives equal to the number of Dealers in the game. Each murder attempt removes one life. When all lives are gone, they die.

STRATEGY:
Be a strong voice. Act as a shield for The Party Animals, forcing Dealers to waste multiple nights trying to kill them.

roles.name: The Drama Queen
roles.description:
OBJECTIVE: Use vendetta power upon death to help Party Animals.

SPECIAL ABILITIES:
 Vendetta Power: When killed, can swap two cards with remaining players and look at the cards swapped. Can only be used once on the night they die.

STRATEGY:
If killed, use the swap to uncover a Dealer or mess up The Dealers' plans by swapping a Dealer's card with an innocent one.

roles.name: The Club Manager
roles.description:
OBJECTIVE: To survive. Cares only about profit and herself.

SPECIAL ABILITIES:
 Sight Card: Every night, can look at a fellow player's card without others seeing.

STRATEGY:
Use the information to manipulate the game. Help whichever side ensures her survival.

roles.name: The Ally Cat
roles.description:
OBJECTIVE: Help identify Dealers using the word 'Meow'.

SPECIAL ABILITIES:
 Vantage Point: Can open eyes when The Bouncer checks I.D.s. Can only communicate findings using 'Meow'.
 Nine Lives: Has 9 lives. Needs 9 murder attempts to die. Each attack removes one life.

STRATEGY:
Gather info during The Bouncer's turn and use diverse 'Meows' to hint at the truth without revealing The Bouncer.

roles.name: The Silver Fox
roles.description:
OBJECTIVE: Force a player to expose their role.

SPECIAL ABILITIES:
 Expose Secrets: Once per game, ply a player with alcohol at the start of the night. That player must hold up their role card for 5 seconds for the entire club to see.

STRATEGY:
Only use this when you are highly confident the target is a Dealer. Exposing an innocent player makes them vulnerable.

roles.name: The Predator
roles.description:
OBJECTIVE: To survive and take down another player with him upon death.

SPECIAL ABILITIES:
 Death Retaliation: If voted out, The Predator chooses one of the players who voted against him to die with him.

STRATEGY:
Fraternize with innocent players. If he is about to be voted out, try to get a Dealer to vote for him so he can take them down with him.

roles.name: The Second Wind
roles.description:
OBJECTIVE: Survive. Upon death, convince Dealers to convert her.

SPECIAL ABILITIES:
 Conversion: If killed, can convince Dealers to turn her into one of them. If they agree, she revives as a Dealer and no one dies that night.

STRATEGY:
Play loyal initially. If killed, secure a second life by switching sides.

roles.name: The Creep
roles.description:
OBJECTIVE: To survive and inherit a role.

SPECIAL ABILITIES:
• Pretend Role: At the start, choose a player to mimic. Your alliance becomes their alliance.
• Inheritance: When the player they are pretending to be dies, The Creep takes over that role immediately.

STRATEGY:
Choose a powerful role to copy. Stay alive until they die so you can become them.

roles.name: The Bartender
roles.description:
OBJECTIVE: To find The Dealers by checking if players are on the same team.

SPECIAL ABILITIES:
 Mixology: Each night, choose two players. The Host will indicate if they are on the SAME team or DIFFERENT teams.

STRATEGY:
Use the pairwise information to map out the network of alliances. If one person is known innocent, anyone who matches them is also innocent.
